description:
When initiating first KB upload, show detailed progress visualization explaining each stage: file parsing (MinerU), embedding generation, LightRAG KG construction, numbered item indexing. Include educational tooltips explaining why each step matters for RAG quality.

**Rationale:** KB ingestion can take minutes for large documents, and the multi-stage pipeline (raw → parsed → embedded → indexed) is invisible to users. Progress visualization with educational content manages expectations and builds understanding of the RAG architecture.
title: Progress Visualization for Empty Knowledge Base Upload
